ch.supertomcat.bh.queue

Interface IDownloadListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Pic

    public interface IDownloadListener
    Interface of QueueData for downloads, so they will know, when they are allowed to start the download, after they requested a download-slot.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean downloadAllowed()
      Allows a Pic to start the download The Pic should then return true, if it has really started the pic or false if not.
      java.lang.String getContainerURL()
      Returns the Container-URL of a listener Since QueueData contains counters for the connections per domain the removeListener-Method needs the Container-URL to decrause the counter for the domain of the Container-URL.
      double getDownloadRate()
      Returns the current bitrate
      void recalcutateRate()
      The pic should now recalculate the download-rate

    • Method Detail

      • downloadAllowed

        boolean downloadAllowed()
        Allows a Pic to start the download The Pic should then return true, if it has really started the pic or false if not. If it does return a wrong value, QueueData would start too many downloads or would not increase the counter and would not increase the slots used.
        Returns:
        True/False

      • getContainerURL

        java.lang.String getContainerURL()
        Returns the Container-URL of a listener Since QueueData contains counters for the connections per domain the removeListener-Method needs the Container-URL to decrause the counter for the domain of the Container-URL. I could also check if the listener is a Pic and then cast to Pic, but i did it with this way.
        Returns:
        Container-URL

      • recalcutateRate

        void recalcutateRate()
        The pic should now recalculate the download-rate

      • getDownloadRate

        double getDownloadRate()
        Returns the current bitrate
        Returns:
        Bitrate
